mapper.select: SELECT MID, POSTER, LINK, TITLE, CONTENT, GENRE, RUNTIME, DIRECTOR, "CAST", AGE, "TYPE", OPENDATE FROM P_MOVIE
SELECT MID, POSTER, LINK, TITLE, CONTENT, GENRE, RUNTIME, DIRECTOR, "CAST", AGE, "TYPE", OPENDATE FROM P_MOVIE WHERE MID=#{MID}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MOVIE.P_MOVIE (MID, POSTER, LINK, TITLE, CONTENT, GENRE, RUNTIME, DIRECTOR, "CAST", AGE, "TYPE", OPENDATE) VALUES(#{mid}, #{poster}, #{link}, #{title},#{content},#{genre},#{runTime},#{director},#{cast},#{age},#{type},#{openDate})
